entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as wearing a Weasley jumper and having a better one than Fred and George. He is also referred to by name when Ron pulls over his head.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as wearing a blue jumper with a large yellow F on it. He is also referred to as making more of an effort if you're not family.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as wearing a blue jumper with a large yellow G on it. He is also referred to as knowing he's called Gred and Forge.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as not wearing his Weasley jumper because he hates maroon. He is also referred to by name when pulling over Harry's head.

entities.name: percy weasley
entities.description: Percy Weasley is mentioned as sticking his head through the door and looking disapproving. He is also referred to as carrying a lumpy jumper over his arm.

relationships.description: Harry's Weasley jumper is described as being better than Fred's.
Harry's Weasley jumper is also described as being better than George's.
Fred and George are referred to as brothers, indicated by the large yellow F and G on their jumpers.
